name: qr_code_gen
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool simple_cheap_qr_code_generator.
Tool description: Send a string, get a QR CODE - As simple as it gets
API description: This endpoint takes a "GET" request with the "url" query parameter and returns a QR code image associated with the text passed.

url.description: The URL for which to generate the QR code.
